description: Transient memory for immediate context within a conversation, cleared after short inactivity or session end.
privacy_considerations: Does not persist beyond current session; safe for sensitive data.

description: Memory retained within a day to support session continuity and follow-up interactions.
privacy_considerations: Limited lifespan reduces exposure but still may contain personal info.

description: Memory that preserves user preferences, recurring topics, and ongoing projects for about a month.
privacy_considerations: Requires clear consent and secure storage due to longer persistence.

description: Persistent memory storing extensive user profiles, accumulated knowledge, and historic interactions.
privacy_considerations: Highest privacy and security requirements; subject to data retention policies.

description: Memory accessible by multiple agents or modules to enable collaboration and consistency.
privacy_considerations: Must be carefully managed to avoid unintended data exposure across agents.

description: Immutable logs and audit trails for compliance, debugging, and system health.
privacy_considerations: Typically anonymized or pseudonymized to protect user privacy.
